name: Minimizing Retaliation
description: Strategies for preventing and mitigating retaliation attempts from a PSN after leaving.

cards.title: Digital and Legal Disentanglement
cards.description: Cutting all digital, legal, and financial ties to prevent leverage.
bulletpoints: Changing all passwords, security questions, and digital footprints before leaving.
Securing restraining orders and legal protection where necessary.
Using anonymous digital tools to avoid cyberstalking and tracking.
cards.summaryText: Scrub your digital footprint, lock in legal shields, and route communications through anonymous channels so they lose every handle on you before you walk.

cards.title: Countering Smear Campaigns
cards.description: Neutralizing defamation attempts and false narratives post-exit.
bulletpoints: Preemptively informing key allies about possible false accusations.
Gathering evidence before leaving to counter potential legal attacks.
Using controlled silence to prevent giving them more ammunition.
cards.summaryText: Brief your inner circle on the lies that might surface, archive proof to kill smear attempts, and stay quiet so they canâ€™t twist fresh words against you.

cards.title: Physical and Emotional Safety Measures
cards.description: Ensuring security against physical, social, and emotional retaliation.
bulletpoints: Avoiding predictable routines that can be tracked.
Building strong support networks to prevent emotional reattachment.
Creating a rapid response plan for unexpected confrontations.
cards.summaryText: Switch up routes and schedules, anchor yourself with allies who keep you grounded, and prep a go-bag plan so any surprise confrontation gets shut down fast.
